about-section.title: About PlaylistWizard
about-section.description: Everything you need to know about PlaylistWizard

what-is-playlistwizard.title: What is PlaylistWizard?
what-is-playlistwizard.content: PlaylistWizard is a web application that allows you to manage your YouTube playlists. You can copy, shuffle, merge, and delete your playlists and playlist items.

how-to-use.title: How to Use
how-to-use.content: Simply sign in with your Google account, and you can start managing your playlists after you select playlists you want to manage.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions or bug reports, please contact me via <1>Github Issues</1> or <2>X (Twitter)</2>.

note.title: NOTE
note.content: The PlaylistWizard is developed by <1>{{dev}}</1>. The application is not affiliated with YouTube or Google. The application uses YouTube Data API v3. See more details on <2>Terms and Privacy</2>.
